verses.roman:
āmiha rāyera sthāne śuni kṛṣṇa-kathā
śunite icchā haya yadi, punaḥ yāha tathā

synonyms: āmiha—I also; rāyera sthāne—from Rāmānanda Rāya; śuni—hear; kṛṣṇa-kathā—talks of Kṛṣṇa; śunite—to hear; icchā—desire; haya—there is; yadi—if; punaḥ—again; yāha—go; tathā—there.
translation: "I also hear topics about Kṛṣṇa from Rāmānanda Rāya. If you want to hear such topics, go to him again.
